nodes.text: Donadus was an astronomical object located in the Donadus system, a part of the Inner Rim's Bamula sector. It shared its name with the sentient species Donadi.

The pirate group known as the Chorran shipjackers operated out of Donadus. At some point between 17 BBY and 0 ABY, the Human bounty hunter Beilert Valance led a group of mercenaries in routing the Donadus-based pirates, a mission that helped Valance attain the status of an elite hunter.

Donadus was first mentioned in "The Hunt Within: Valance's Tale: Part 1," a Wizards.com roleplaying article containing "Mission 1: Raid on Picutorion," a scenario for use with the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Miniatures game. The article was authored by Jason Fry and published on December 2, 2004. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Donadus system, and therefore the celestial body Donadus, within grid square J-13.
